house_listing.house_description: The open views of the river sets the tone. Vaulted ceilings, french doors, arched window heightens the feeling of space. The 33' deck is accessible from great room & gourmet kit. Guest bdrm suite down & 2 large bdrms upstairs w/full bath & walk-in closets. Palatial master bath w/2 walk-in closets.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic Fan, Boat Dock, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/VaultedCeilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Foyer, Garage Door Opener, Intercom System,Loft, Microwave, Pantry, Ranch Style, Skylights, Walk-In Closet(s)
